abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid33421056, pmid33399182, pmid33395482, pmid33434112, pmid33433263, pmid33410917, pmid33411065
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2021.01.15
